AND ( BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_Id LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' )
AND ( BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_ID LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{category} ||'%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{category} ||'%' )
AND ( BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{category} ||'%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{category} ||'%' )
ORDER BY
BOARD_DATE DESC
BOARD_VIEW DESC
) D) B WHERE B.R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
